about_the_game:
Witchbound

Haunt the mansion, chase intruders and embrace the haunting, and defend your home from exorcism.

About the Game

Witchbound turns the classic horror genre on its head, placing YOU in the spectral shoes of the ghost. Guard your lair from unwelcome intruders who dare to disrupt your eternal peace. This isn’t just a fight for survival—it’s a fight to preserve your haunted sanctuary.

In this reverse horror experience, players take on the role of a powerful, vengeful spirit bound to an ancient, abandoned mansion. Your mission? Terrify and eliminate intruders who seek to banish you from your domain. As you patrol the eerie halls of your home, AI-controlled NPC players will collaborate to complete tasks that unravel the exorcism ritual.

Key Features

  • The Ghost’s Perspective: You’re no helpless victim. Harness your supernatural abilities to stalk, terrify, and dispatch those who dare enter your domain.

  • Dynamic Cat-and-Mouse Gameplay: Outsmart the intruders as they work together to cleanse the mansion. Strike fear into their hearts, isolate them, and remove them one by one.

  • Evolving Challenges: As the exorcism progresses, NPC intruders grow more determined and resourceful. Adapt your strategies to keep your home under your control.

  • Atmospheric Haunting: Explore your cursed mansion, rich with secrets, chilling visuals, and immersive soundscapes that heighten the suspense.

  • Game Modes: Unlock Veilbound, a challenging mode where the line between the physical world and the supernatural thins, amplifying both your powers and the intruders’ resolve.

Gameplay Overview

  • For the Intruders: Complete ritualistic tasks scattered throughout the mansion while evading the ghost. Work together—or fall one by one.

  • For the Ghost: Use stealth, fear, and precision to hunt the intruders. Discover weaknesses in their plans and strike before they finish the exorcism.

Can you preserve the peace of your eternal afterlife, or will you be cast out into the void?

Witchbound awaits. Are you ready to haunt?
